name: Tankies (White Ant)
description:
Tankie is a special Panzer which have ability to summon turret as it weapon to destroy target. Play your way to defeat all the enemies and plan your turrets wisely for less consume of energy cube to achieve your best score. Enjoy!

GAME PLAY:
-Collect Energy Cubes.
-Summon turrets to defeat enemies (Consume Energy Cube)
-Defeat Boss.
-Beat your high score :)

Game Control:
Move Direction – W,A,S,D.
Shoot – Mouse Left Click.
Summon Turret - Key 1 - Cannon.
                                       Key 2 - Shield.
                                       Key 3 - Air Missile.

Compatible Browsers:

Google Chrome & Mozilla Firefox.

FPS checking:
During game play press key ~
